items.title: Quick Take - What will the collaboration with UBS mean for 360 ONE?
items.description: The deal will make 360 ONE an invincible player in India’s wealth management industry

items.title: International Gemmological Institute (India): Dimming growth prospects
items.description: The 10 percent import tariff by the US is likely to increase costs and have an adverse effect on discretionary demand.

items.title: Telecom gear maker Mavenir slashes jobs in India in global recast and missed 4G/5G contracts
items.description: The layoffs are part of a broader global restructuring effort to align with shifting market dynamics and optimising operations. Sources told Moneycontrol that the job cuts are primarily affecting employees in the radio and RAN engineering departments, mirroring similar reductions seen in the US.
